CustomField.description: Indicates whether 'Ok to arrive early' option was selected for this work order in the Calendar View Manage Appointments screen, when it was sent to ServicePower for booking as an SLA job.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates whether 'Ok to arrive early' option was selected for this work order in the Calendar View Manage Appointments screen, when it was sent to ServicePower for booking as an SLA job.
CustomField.label: Ok To Arrive Early
